name: Rent-a-Cop Reloaded
overview: An update to Achim Volkers' original Rent-a-Cop by Achim Volkers in 2018, this update was published in the Reset #12 Mix-i-Disk. Achim and team present us with a modern C64 remake of Keystone Capers (Atari 2600), and we’re glad they did! You are Mr. Smith, beginning your qualifying training as a police officer. Thrown into the deep end, all you need to do is catch the criminal and stay alive while completing each shift. Sounds easy! Well, no. With obstacles and criminal accomplices out to make your task even more difficult, failure may be imminent! Thanks to Achim for permission to use this game on the disk.
